name: The Chronicles of Inotia 3: Children of Carnia
name_original: The Chronicles of Inotia 3: Children of Carnia
description:
The journey begins with a young boy named Lucio and young girl named Ameli, preparing for an adulthood ceremony. During the preparation they encounter an injured orc, who's dying wish is that they return a pair of gauntlets to his tribe. This sets them on a quest, where Lucio's destiny is slowly revealed, and his mysterious dreams are brought to light.

This action role playing game allows the player to choose from several classes each with unique skills. Party members are gathered along the way. Loot that is equipped changes stats and appearance. Many side quests fill the various maps, and new quests are generated in newgame+.
